item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, September 9, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. QUIC is not quick enough over fast internet (361 points | 157 comments)
2. Wind Becomes Britain's Largest Electricity Source (11 points | 1 comment)
3. Comfy, the 2D rust game engine, is now archived (17 points | 3 comments)
4. Show HN: What do your GitHub starred repos say about you? (5 points | 1 comment)

6. Sleep duration, chronotype, health and lifestyle factors affect cognition [pdf] (153 points | 81 comments)
7. Creating a Git Commit: The Hard Way (181 points | 18 comments)
8. Reclaim the Stack (371 points | 209 comments)
9. Linux's Bedtime Routine (133 points | 16 comments)
10. Which open-source projects are widely used but maintained by just a few people? (55 points | 47 comments)

13. Bitten by Unicode (63 points | 63 comments)

24. Show HN: Ki Editor - the multicursor syntactical editor (74 points | 24 comments)

26. Htmx, Raku and Pico CSS (148 points | 103 comments)
27. Analysis of adversarial binary search game (31 points | 4 comments)
28. Charging lithium-ion batteries at high currents first increases lifespan by 50% (194 points | 78 comments)
29. Bringing insights into TCP resets and timeouts to Cloudflare Radar (42 points | 6 comments)
30. Confirmed: Reflection 70B's official API is a wrapper for Sonnet 3.5 (168 points | 36 comments)
